entry.title: Women’s Sauna Tank Top/Leggings Combo (Turquoise)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Sauna Suits
Price: 50.00

  • Increases oxygen consumption, which improves cardiovascular endurance
  • Raises internal temperature to increase flexibility
  • Reflective detailing for improved safety in low-light situations
  • Neoprene material with flat-lock stitching and mesh underarm design prevent skin irritation
  • Leggings have a high-waisted fit with a discreet zipper pocket
  • Tank top includes side zippers for convenient dressing

The Women’s Sauna Vest/Leggings combo provides our customers with two critical factors: clothing that works with — not against — your exercise routine and a style that distinguishes you from the crowd. Wearing sauna gear increases your body’s internal temperature, which improves cardiovascular endurance and overall flexibility. Get more out of every workout you do with this gear combo.

Material: 100% Neoprene

Care: Hand wash in cold water only. Air dry away from direct sunlight. Do not dry clean, iron or tumble dry.

entry.title: Men’s Sauna Vest/Shorts Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Sauna Suits
Price: 50.00

  • Increases oxygen consumption, which improves cardiovascular endurance
  • Raises internal temperature to increase flexibility
  • Neoprene material with flat-lock stitching and mesh underarm design prevent skin irritation
  • Easy, quick-release zipper for convenience
  • Shorts include mesh crotch for better range of motion
  • Shorts have reflective detailing for improved safety in low-light situations

The Men’s Sauna Vest/Shorts combo was built with one goal in mind: helping you achieve your fitness goals. When you are doing cardiovascular training, the last thing you need is bulky clothing weighing you down. This lightweight combo will keep you limber and help increase one of the most important aspects of cardio exercise: your oxygen consumption.

Material: 100% Neoprene

Care: Hand wash in cold water only. Air dry away from direct sunlight. Do not dry clean, iron or tumble dry.
